DOC.brief_summary: Topical ophthalmic antibiotic common prescribe prior eye surgery low risk infection . Previous study suggest antibiotic contain preservative ( Zymar ) kill bacteria much quicker without preservative ( Vigamox ) . The purpose research compare quickly two commonly prescribe antibiotic eliminate bacteria eye surface .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Comparison Zymar ( Gatifloxacin ) Vigamox ( Moxifloxacin ) Killing Conjunctival Bacterial Flora Following One-hour Application
DOC.criteria: Age old 50 year age Diagnosis Cataract cataract surgery Systemic topical antibiotic treatment within 30 day Use systemic topical steroid Active ocular infection Ocular surgery past 6 month Allergy fluoroquinolones
